item.description:
Join Luan & Alan in welcoming back Jojomima at The Leominster Elks, 134 N. Main St., Leominster, MA! The Elks is air conditioned and offers a great floor, great crowd, great atmosphere and great bar!
If you like Roger Ceresi's All Starz and Loaded Dice, you're going to love Jojomima. Jojomima plays retro 50's and early 60's music that really swings and they'll definately keep you on the dance floor! They're fun and energetic! We've gotten a lot of requests from our dancers for this band because they play this type of music...So don't miss out on the fun!
The band features:
Joey Sullivan (Roger Ceresi's All Starz and Loaded Dice)
Rob Nelson (Roger Ceresi's All Starz and Loaded Dice)
Mark Germana (Jaded)
Ray Wild Goose (Beggars Bankrupt)
6:30pm Beginner Friendly Group Swing Dance Lesson
7:30pm Swing Dance with Jojomima!!
Admission: $12

From Rte 2, East or West, take Ex 31A. That will put you on Rte 12 South. Go through three sets of lights and the Elks is on your right (look for a white building). Entrance in rear.
item.name: Swing Dance to Live Music
